Hello!


I am Eric Gonzalez, an aspiring gameplay and software engineer who loves to develop games and interactive entertainment.

Background

I am a recent graduate from California State University, Monterey Bay with a Bachelors of Science in Computer Science and with a concentration in Game Development. I also graduated with a minor in Mathematics.

During my time at CSU Monterey Bay, I joined and became the Vice President of the Game Developers Club for two semesters, where I led several small game projects. I also researched and became interested in technology-based education and the use of games in education through game-based learning.

I am very early on in my game development career, only having worked on small prototype projects. However, as I continously expand my knowledge skills, I am pursuing a professional career as a Gameplay Programmer with startup studios and AAA game companies alike.
